scripts.build: cd themes/blowfish && npm install && cd ../.. && set NODE_ENV=production && npx @tailwindcss/cli -c ./themes/blowfish/tailwind.config.js -i ./themes/blowfish/assets/css/main.css -o ./assets/css/compiled/main.css --jit
scripts.build-windows: cd themes/blowfish && npm install && cd ../.. && set NODE_ENV=production && npx @tailwindcss/cli -c ./themes/blowfish/tailwind.config.js -i ./themes/blowfish/assets/css/main.css -o ./assets/css/compiled/main.css --jit
scripts.dev: cd themes/blowfish && npm install && cd ../.. && set NODE_ENV=development && npx @tailwindcss/cli -c ./themes/blowfish/tailwind.config.js -i ./themes/blowfish/assets/css/main.css -o ./assets/css/compiled/main.css --jit -w
scripts.dev-windows: cd themes/blowfish && npm install && cd ../.. && set NODE_ENV=development && npx @tailwindcss/cli -c ./themes/blowfish/tailwind.config.js -i ./themes/blowfish/assets/css/main.css -o ./assets/css/compiled/main.css --jit -w
scripts.preview: node scripts/directus-fetch-articles.js && git submodule update --remote --merge && start http://192.168.0.5:1313 && hugo server -w -D -p 1313 --bind 0.0.0.0 --contentDir content -e production --enableGitInfo --gc --minify --disableKinds RSS --renderToMemory
scripts.server: git submodule update --remote --merge && start http://192.168.0.5:1313 && hugo server -w -D -p 1313 --bind 0.0.0.0 --contentDir content -e production --enableGitInfo --gc --minify --disableKinds RSS --renderToMemory
